text.p: These are the leading stories in the Moroccan press on Saturday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Former prime minister Maati Bouabid dies. He will be buried on Saturday in Casablanca.
- U.N's Secretary-General Boutros Boutros-Ghali presents report to the Security Council over the Western Sahara at the end of November.
- Anita Gradin, European Union official, holds talks with Moroccan officials on drugs trafficking and immigration.
- France converts Moroccan foreign debt into investment soft loans.
